name: The Chicken or the Egg (SergioGardella)
description:
This is my entry to the Mini Jam #110 - Game Jam (11th of July 2022).

Controls:

  • A to rotate left.
  • D to rotate right.
  • Right mouse button x10 to lay an egg.
  • Left mouse button to hatch an egg.

The theme of the Jam was Sacrifice. I implemented this making the Player play as a chicken surrounded by monsters. The Player must lay eggs and sacrifice them in order for the monsters to temporarily retreat. 

The limitation of the Jam was Failure is inevitable. This was implemented making the game theoretically "endless". Every random time a new monster is spawned (indicated by a howling sound), so it is actually impossible to not fail at some point.

The game was developed with Unity for the game development, Blender for the 3D modeling, unwrapping and animation and Gimp for texture creation. I also used Modbox 3.2.2 for the sound effect of the monsters approaching and Audacity for recording and tuning of the rest of the audio effects.

All assets have been developed exclusively for this Game Jam, but the font:

  • TheyPerished.ttf
